DataElement.preferredName: Registering Study Site Specified Institution Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine whether the a specific facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted is the site of registration.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled._A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted._Clearly and explicitly stated._An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.
